author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
Tatkal facility

Those aspiring

to appear for eighth standard public examination exams for private candidates which begins on April 1 can apply online through tatkal procedure on March 11 and 12. Aspirants could apply online on these two days at one of the nodal centres listed on the websitewww.tndge.in. The candidates applying through tatkal procedure have to pay a fee of Rs. 675, which will include the examination fee, special fee and the fee for submitting the application online. More information can be obtained fromwww.tndge.in
title: Tatkal registration for eighth standard exam
